member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.ExpandResultAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to ensure a result is always expanded or optionally pass a boolean specifying behaviour

member.name: M:Skyward.Popcorn.ExpandResultAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Apply this attribute to specify whether a result is to always expand or never expand
member.param: Defaults to true. If set to false, result will not be expanded. If passing false, you can also use

member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.DoNotExpandResultAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to ensure a result is never expanded

member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.PopcornExtensions
member.summary: Some useful extensions for Web App style configuration

member.name: M:Skyward.Popcorn.PopcornExtensions.UsePopcorn(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Skyward.Popcorn.Abstractions.PopcornFactory})
member.summary: Configure the AspNet Core MVC options to include an Api Expander. Allow the caller to configure it with an action.
